contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Our bamboo sham set is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties.  Set incl
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Bamboo Lyocell Quilted Sham Set

content.value: Our bamboo sham set is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties. Set includes two shams.
Set includes two shams
Shell crafted of 100% organic bamboo
Filled with 180-gsm of 100% recycled polyester
Hypoallergenic - ideal for allergen sensitive sleepers
Sham features envelope closure
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Made with care in China

Machine wash cold on delicate with like fabrics, tumble dry low.  Avoid bleach. To prevent pilling, avoid fabric softener or dryer balls. To avoid wrinkles, remove immediately after drying. Iron on low if desired.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Set includes two shams
  • Shell crafted of 100% organic bamboo
  • Filled with 180-gsm of 100% recycled polyester
  • Hypoallergenic - ideal for allergen sensitive sleepers
  • Sham features envelope closure
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Made with care in China

productDescription.productDescription: Our bamboo sham set is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties. Set includes two shams.
